website_summaries.verdict: A moderately priced 27-inch monitor designed for CAD/CAM users and content creators, the BenQ PD2700Q offers a nice selection of picture presets and delivers very good grayscale and viewing-angle performance.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I work as a concept artist so a good screen is a must, I thought I'd give this a try adding it as a third monitor and I'm impressed with the accuracy of it. Definitely worth the money, a good size and super easy to set up. The standard calibration on the built in rgb setting was actually good enough straight away, I simply knocked the brightness down to around 40 which was required in my dark'ish room.
customer_reviews.author: ssmltd

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, can't find any fault with it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months daily use, I am very pleased with this monitor. Installation was easy. Even has a good stand at the right height (rare in my experience), and even looks nice too. I use it for video editing, photo viewing and minor editing, daily browsing and email. On/off switch is in a convient place. all the inputs I need. Picture is very good/excellent in my opinion. I am not a gamer, so no verdict on that. I tried to think of something negative, but cannot think of anything at all. I looked at all the monitors in this price range, and chose it for resolution. HD wasn't enough, this is way better for my MacMini. Overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great screen, terrible connection issues
customer_reviews.text: It is a shame I have to rate it 3 stars, when the only issue is actually a pretty big one. Almost on a daily basis, this screen refuses to connect to my macbook. I unplug everything, plug everything back, still says it can't detect my macbook. This has become such a nuisance, I've seriously considered returning it several times. I figured I need to turn it off for about 15min, disconnect all cables, then turn it back on, connect all cables and then MAYBE it will connect. Once it's connected no issues. Real shame at this price point Benq couldn't resolve these connection issues.
customer_reviews.author: Susana Santos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for digital design
customer_reviews.text: After reading a load of reviews on other screens everything pointed me at this one. I read some of the reviews and it was pretty mixed. I took the chance and purchased the screen and what can I tell you, I love it. I'm a digital designer and need crisp detail when it comes to working with type and pixels and this screen does it all. Seriously can recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Very good picture quality straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for photography and editing in particular. The colours are good and no adjustments were needed. The monitor practically set itself up and it does what I bought it for - and does it well. Can't really comment on durability as it's early days yet - ask me again in a couple of years time!
customer_reviews.author: strollonby

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor
customer_reviews.text: A very nice monitor indeed. Great clarity and brightness with very accurate colours. Perfect for photo and video work and is just fine for basic gaming as well. Very flexible with good connectivity. The only drawback is a thick bezel but it still looks the business. I actually prefer it to my other two Dell QHD monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: European import
customer_reviews.text: The monitor I received is clearly a European import (doesn't come with a UK plug.) Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: tdog

customer_reviews.title: Very nice monitor for a good price
customer_reviews.text: A very nice monitor. Gamma is accurate, backlight is even and gradients show no sign of banding. The menu buttons are slightly fiddly, and when I received the monitor it had a slight yellow/green tint to whites, but this is easily fixed in the menu (Menu > Picture > Colour temperature > User define > Reduce the green). Sound is a bit tinny, but overall I am very happy with the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: A Moreton

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor for photography editing and it has not disappointed. The colours are very true and the screen is very kind on the eyes, even after several hours of editing. It is surprisingly good for the price and I am delighted with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: andy parahandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor with a dead pixel
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice upgrade from my previous BenQ monitor (also excellent but smaller and with less accurate colours). If it did not have a dead pixel, I would give it 5 stars, as for this price its quality is perfect. But even that one dead pixel is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tamas

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear image
customer_reviews.text: makes my older (also BENQ) 24" Full-HD monitor look blurry. And even with this monitor set to 1920x1080, the two monitors side-by-side are a world apart. for reference, the other monitor is a TN panel, and this is an IPS panel, which also makes a large difference.
customer_reviews.author: Somer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant monitor. I use this with my MacBook Pro as a screen extension. None of the picture quality is lost at all and it is perfect! Haven’t used it for gaming at present, only spreadsheets but it’s a perfect size to make working from home much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Emma J

customer_reviews.title: A photographers dream.
customer_reviews.text: This is a first class monitor for photography, I like the size of screen the fact that it is not reflective the quality of the colour range and how it appears. My only gripe is there is no written instructions included in the box. Quality at a sensible price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: Good value monitor
customer_reviews.text: Using the monitor for photo editing and general business stuff. Easy to set up and no sign, after a couple of weeks, of the flicker mentioned in other reviews. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LesTele

customer_reviews.title: A good upgrade from a 24" monitor
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is surprisingly light for its size. Great picture from out of the box. All buttons are on the back of the monitor which is a good idea but it takes some getting used to. I wanted this for photo editing mainly and I think it's a good value buy in this regard.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a gamer I should say, using this at home for photo editing and occasionally CAD, it worth every penny so far, using it on 10 bit and really impressed with color and contrast, accurate and precise.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A

customer_reviews.title: No power or HDMI cables
customer_reviews.text: Monitor arrived without power, HDMI or any other cables. !!! One star. I gave another star for excellent customer service which sorted everything out quickly. The monitor itself is brilliant though you will need to do a lot of work to get the settings right.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hill

customer_reviews.title: Lovely screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when upgrading my desktop and shows massive improvement over three year old screen it replaced. Best review I can give? My wife even commented on the improved brightness and colour, she never normally comments on tech!
customer_reviews.author: cushinm

customer_reviews.title: multiple outputs and matches brilliantly alongside my 5K iMac screen
customer_reviews.text: Stunning monitor. Sharp, clear, crisp, multiple outputs and matches brilliantly alongside my 5K iMac screen.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty Matters

customer_reviews.title: Great for digital art
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research I decided to buy this BenQ monitor for my digital art and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Put.that.book.down.Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great build and screen quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good product, high build quality and very good colour accuracy
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Tomkins

customer_reviews.title: Totally Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great colours for (amateur) family photo editing and the perfect resolution for working with texts (emails and spreadsheets) at close proximity. I wanted to go for UHD/ 4K model initially but looking at price difference opted to chance this QHD model instead. Very glad I did so!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Really nice monitor. A thousand times better than my previous one. Good resolution, seems fine for gaming, although mine is casual. Brightness is great and colours seem perfect.
customer_reviews.author: B. M.

customer_reviews.title: High quality big screen
customer_reviews.text: Excellent screen superior to the normal standard Nice finish on the stand and surround and brilliant packaging, packed like an iphone
customer_reviews.author: Buddy boy

customer_reviews.title: A good solid 10bit panel at a good price
customer_reviews.text: A good solid 10bit panel at a good price. Colour is good and they have calibrated well with good uniformity at this price point. One day I will buy Eizo's but for now these are great.
customer_reviews.author: MR RJ BRADBURY

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Really good monitor for a cheap price , would recommend if you are in tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: Dhan Gurung

customer_reviews.title: Monitor is working fine, almost no blacklight bleed what so ever
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is working fine, almost no blacklight bleed what so ever. Unfortunately I am met with a piss stain yellow tint across the whole monitor. Returned within an hour of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Could have been much much better
customer_reviews.text: Screen burn straight from the beginning. First monitor didn't even work so had to return it. This is the second one and I am not pleased at all with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad-Adrian Ignatescu

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, great colour performance
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason you buy BenQ monitors. That reason is the colour rendering, this simply looks stunning. I'm using this for photoshop editing and it does everything it says it does. Only slight niggle is that that the bezel around the display is a bit thick. It will be noticeable if you've got a multi-monitor setup though. That said, I am thinking of ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Grant MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Professional screen for Professionals
customer_reviews.text: Having been using Benq's 32inch offering of this display for 4 years, I knew this would be a rock solid purchase; and I'm not disappointed. A beautiful, elegant display perfectly suited for the professional environment. The low price tag is also highly attractive for it to be a second or even third display. Strongly recommend Benq's Professional range.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nutter

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the stand does not fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if the monitor is good or bad, the item arrived quickly but the stand retaining screw does not line up with the hole so it was impossible to fit the base to the stand. Thankfully easy returns with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Blake Drayson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: I know it can vary but no dead or bright pixels first time, so that's good. Almost no light bleed around the edges but that can vary too. Overall a good monitor. 60Mhz only so gamers may want to look else-ware, but my 2080Ti makes a nonsense of the games I play. I do digital photography so 10 bit is very useful and makes my other two 8 bit monitors look extremely dull. Extremely pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Landeryou

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased via company account. Delivered on time. Packaging intact. Easy set up and connection. Worked straight away. Would like to mention especially it connects and works very well with my Mac Book via HDMI. Cable also included! Screen size very adequate for working on multiple documents. Safe my eyes. Also bought extended warranty. BTW, stand is well-made, feels sturdy. Adjustable height very adequate to place mac book in front of the monitor. Highly recommended. This is my first monitor thought and not sure if the cheaper ones are as good for multi-documents tasking.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Y. K. Lee
